remarks: The projective map of the GLB of a set of lattice elements ` S ` . Variant of Theorem 15.5.2 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 62.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2011.)

pmapglb $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ S C_ B /\ S =/= (/) ) -> ( M ` ( G ` S ) ) = |^|_ x e. S ( M ` x ) ) $.
